name.ja: ハーピィズフルドレス

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Ladies" on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK and 400 DEF. If you have 1 or 3 face-up monsters on your field, the equipped monster inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster.
